org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.components.anchor

Class Anchor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vaadin.server.AbstractClientConnector
      • com.vaadin.ui.AbstractComponent
        • org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.components.anchor.Anchor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.vaadin.event.MethodEventSource, com.vaadin.server.ClientConnector, com.vaadin.server.Sizeable, com.vaadin.shared.communication.ClientRpc, com.vaadin.shared.Connector, com.vaadin.ui.Component, java.io.Serializable, AnchorClientRpc

    public class Anchor
extends com.vaadin.ui.AbstractComponent
implements AnchorClientRpc
    A multi-purpose anchor element (e.g. <a></a>). Can be used to:
    1. Display an anchor that handles click events on the server.
    2. Display an anchor that executes custom javascript code when clicked (and thus acts as a bookmarklet).
    Author:
    SkyCrawl
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Anchor

        public Anchor(java.lang.String caption,
      com.vaadin.event.MouseEvents.ClickListener listener)
        Creates an anchor that handles click events on the server.

      • Anchor

        public Anchor(java.lang.String caption,
      java.lang.String functionSource)
        Creates an anchor that executes custom javascript code when clicked.
        Parameters:
        caption - the title of the anchor
        functionSource - the javascript code to execute when user clicks the anchor, e.g.:
        • alert('Hello world!');
        • function(){ alert('Hello world!'); }
        bookmarklet - true to make this anchor a bookmarklet
